StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateRecruiter]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @RecruiterId uniqueiden..er, @Data image ) AS
DECLARE @retVal int
IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM [AFP].[USMC].[Recruiter] WHERE RecruiterId = @RecruiterId) BEGIN UPDATE [AFP].[USMC].[Recruiter] SET Data = @Data WHERE RecruiterId = @RecruiterId SET @retVal = 1 END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [AFP].[USMC].[Recruiter] ([RecruiterId] ,[Data]) VALUES (@RecruiterId ,@Data)
SET @retVal = 0 END
SELECT @retVal
